full_summary:
## Government Supply Tender Announcement
### Request for Proposal for Electromagnetic Frequency Assessment System Kit (EFASK)
#### Contract Information

* **Contract Reference:** WS4121778895-Doc4231919067 (version 3)
* **Publication Date:** Tuesday, September 27, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** Thursday, November 2, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** Monday, September 5, 2023
* **Expected Contract End Date:** Sunday, February 24, 2024
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Industry Department (ISED)

#### Inquiry Details

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) issues this tender announcement for the purchase of an Electromagnetic Frequency Assessment System Kit (EFASK) under Solicitation Number WS4121778895. 

We invite bidders to submit proposals under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other free trade agreements (e.g. Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement).

All bids submitted must meet the following requirements:

* Technical Merit and Price will be evaluated according to the overall combined score.
* The bidder's transducer must be within UNSPSC category 41112100.

#### Solicitation Details

* They can be obtained from the following solicitation website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17569865?extsite=MTc1Njk4NjVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== (Ariba Discovery).
* A mandatory submission policy applies for this solicitation.

Note: The contact information and additional details for this solicitation are available on the solicitation website.

A Technical Inquiry Question and Answer document is also available on the solicitation website. [2]. If there are any questions or changes, please check again, but I do not guarantee it will be answered. [3].
